name: experiment ID
explanation: "give it a 6 number code"

name: Proj_name
explanation: "give your project a unique name"
comment_format_examples: You may use the name of the PI with a number for the year

name: experimentator
explanation: "e-mail of the experimentator"

name: Folder_path
explanation: "path to the Folder of the experiment (containing all data and metadata), path relative to the folder containing the project_metadata.csv file file"

name: group_by
explanation: "variable of the animal metadata, which is used to create groups"

name: video_acquisition
explanation: "name of the software used for the video acquisition, indicate version number."

name: video_folder
explanation: "path to folder containing the videos, relative to Folder_path. Use an name which is explicit about the software used to produce it. Note that multiple folder may exist if the videos were analysed using different software, but this cell can contain only one value."

name: video_analysis
explanation: "name of the software used for the video analysis, indicate version number."

name: raw_data_folder
explanation: "path to folder containing the data, relative to Folder_path. "

name: Comments
explanation: "free text comment for this experiment"

name: animal_metadata
explanation: "path to file containing the metadata for each experiment"

name: lab_metadata
explanation: "path to file containing the metadata for each lab"

name: animal_ID
explanation: "animal ID as entered in the mouse book"

name: animal_birthdate
explanation: "Birth date of the animal"

name: treatment
explanation: "Indicate groups distinguished by a different treatment"
comment_format_examples: PBS Vs drug, sleep deprived vs control,… (Read from mouse book?)

name: genotype
explanation: "Indicate animal genotype, use MGI number if possible"

name: date
explanation: "date of the experiment start"

name: test cage
explanation: "position of cage in setup"

name: real time start
explanation: "indicate the real time of start of the experiment"

name: experiment_folder_name
explanation: "name of folder containing all the data"

name: Behavior_sequence
explanation: "path to file containing the behavior sequence"

name: Onemin_summary
explanation: "path to file containing the minute summary data"

name: Lab_ID
explanation: "indicate the ID of the lab, corresponding to the ID given in the Lab_metadata file"
comment_format_examples: This allows to have enter lab information only once

name: Lab_ID
explanation: "give it a 5 number code"

name: light_on
explanation: "time of day when the light is on in the room (ZT0 time), format is HH:mm:ss"

name: light_off
explanation: "time of day when the light is off , format is HH:mm:ss"

name: temperature
explanation: "temperature in the room, in degree celcius, range:  21 - 23

name: cage_type
explanation: "cage type used for that experiment (2,3,4)"

name: address
explanation: "Gives the address of the lab where the experiment is performed"

name: north_position
explanation: "give position of the north in degrees clockwise, 0 being the direction of the rack over the small side"

name: daylight_intensity_lux
explanation: "measure light intensity 1 h after light on"

name: daylight_spectrum
explanation: "what is the color spectrum of the daylight"

name: nightlight_intensity_lux
explanation: "measure light intensity 1 h after light off"

name: nightlight_change curve
explanation: "How is the light intensity changing at light off"
